text: (minisunē! sækayen tora) pæhædili sādhakayan oba veta pæmiṇi pasuda, oba (islāmayehi sthīra novī) lessā giyahot (obaṭa dan̆ḍuvam kirīmaṭa) niyata vaśayenma allāh balasampannayeku vaśayenda, (obava kumana ākārayakin hæsiraviya yutuda yanna hon̆din dæna siṭina) gnānavantayeku vaśayenda siṭinnēya yanna oba sthīra vaśayen dæna ganu
